password.title: Password
password.strongPasswordError: The password you entered is not strong enough! A password should have at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.

signin.title: Sign in
signin.signUpText: Don't have an account? Sign up

signup.title: Sign up
signup.signInText: Already have an account? Sign in

success.title: Thank you for signing up!
success.message: You should receive an email to activate your account any time now. If you don't find the email, please check your spam as well.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.sucessMessage: An email has been sent to this address. If you don't see the email, please check your spam as well.
